text: I having trouble building Julia master on Windows, and I finally figured out why. My Cygwin PATH meant llvm-config.exe was trying to link LLVM.dll from my Julia 1.5 install. llvm-config.exe would just fail silently.

elements.text: I having trouble building Julia master on Windows, and I finally figured out why. My Cygwin PATH meant llvm-config.exe was trying to link LLVM.dll from my Julia 1.5 install. llvm-config.exe would just fail silently.

text: Good note. I’ll need to remember that for myself in the future. I think I’ve run into that issue before.
